nodes.text: The Icon of the Moon Goddess was a religious idol belonging to Chairman Notluwiski Papanoida. It was cylindrical in shape and had a blue-painted moon on its crest. Papanoida kept it in a shrine in his apartment on Coruscant. His daughter, Che Amanwe Papanoida, used it to defend herself from kidnappers during which a blood stain was left on the idol which led to her retrieval by her father.
